Package system.windows.threading

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDispatcherHookEventHandler
    The Java interface to be implemented to receive events from the CLR using DispatcherHookEventHandler.
    IDispatcherOperationCallback
    The Java interface to be implemented to receive events from the CLR using DispatcherOperationCallback.
    IDispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventHandler
    The Java interface to be implemented to receive events from the CLR using DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventHandler.
    IDispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventHandler
    The Java interface to be implemented to receive events from the CLR using DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventHandler.
